COVID-19 疫苗接种时间与月经周期长度的变化有关吗？在月经周期的第一个卵泡期注射 COVID-19 疫苗可以暂时延长月经周期的持续时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Is-the-timing-of-COVID-19-vaccination-linked-with-changes-in-menstrual-cycle-length.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Is-the-timing-of-COVID-19-vaccination-linked-with-changes-in-menstrual-cycle-length.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1005d675-f5c9-4e76-a355-c3b91be88a81 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 07:35:00 -0400 Is the timing of COVID-19 vaccination associated with changes in menstrual cycle length?
黑人女性权衡“奶油裂纹”直发器的新风险去年，迪安娜·德纳姆·休斯 (Deanna Denham Hughes) 被诊断出患有卵巢癌，她感到非常震惊。她只有 32 岁。她没有癌症家族史，测试也没有发现遗传联系。休斯想知道为什么她，一个原本健康的两个孩子的黑人母亲，会患上一种被称为“沉默杀手”的恶性肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Black-women-weigh-emerging-risks-of-e28098creamy-cracke28099-hair-straighteners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Black-women-weigh-emerging-risks-of-e28098creamy-cracke28099-hair-straighteners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebbec9c3-5d49-429f-b7c6-14070f38b2fb Tue, 01 Aug 2023 07:08:43 -0400 Black women weigh emerging risks of ‘creamy crack’ hair straighteners
